original_text: None of them will go into the land that I promised to give to you to live in. The only men who will go in are Caleb, the son of Jephunneh, and Joshua, the son of Nun.
korean_text: 여분네의 아들 갈렙과 눈의 아들 여호수아 외에는 내가 맹세하여 너희에게 살게 하리라 한 땅에 결단코 들어가지 못하리라

sentences.original_text: None of them will go into the land
sentences.korean_translation: 그들 중 누구도 그 땅에 들어가지 않을 것이다

sentences.original_text: that I promised to give to you
The only men who will go in
are Caleb, the son of Jephunneh
and Joshua, the son of Nun
